original_title: CN Invaded Part 5: Billy & Mandy Moon the Moon
overview: Alien werewolves from the Moon attack Earth and steal all the cheese. It's up to Mandy, Grim, Billy, and Sperg to stop the alien ploy.
tagline: Witness The Unspeakable! Billy and Mandy Encounter The Space Invaders
title: CN Invaded Part 5: Billy & Mandy Moon the Moon
